700806f-a.title: Bronx: Courtlandt Avenue - 154th Street (East)
700806f-a.text:
697 to 717 Courtlandt Avenue, west side, north from E. 154th to
EE. 155th Streets. No. 705-707 is the Bronx Central Palace, Bronx
quarters of the Polski Dom Narodowy (Polish People's Home).
February 17, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.

700155f-a.title: Bronx: 154th Street - Courtlandt Avenue
700155f-a.text:
370 and 376 E. 154th Street, south side, between Courtlandt
anc WSelrose Avenues. No 370 is the 2 s tory frame house set back
from the sidewauk. No. 376 is the 1 atory Miller's Machine Shop
building.
February 17, 1933.
P. L. Sperr

700805f-a.title: Bronx: Courtlandt Avenue - 154th Street (East)
700805f-a.text:
687 to 679 Courtlandt Avenue, at, adjoining and south of the
S. W. corner of E. 154th Street.
February 17, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
